title: "Machine learning facilitates 'turbulence tracking' in fusion reactors"
excerpt: "Researchers demonstrated the use of computer-vision models to monitor turbulent structures that appear in plasma created in controlled-nuclear-fusion research. They created a synthetic dataset to train these models to identify and track the structures,"
